item.title: Art the Clown Will Ring the Nasdaq Closing Bell in Times Square on Halloween!
item.description:
With Terrifier 3 now playing in theaters and just passing $50 million worldwide, Art the Clownâ€™s domination of the Halloween season continues with a takeover of the Nasdaq MarketSite in Times Square!

...Art the Clown and star Lauren LaVera will ring the Nasdaq closing bell!

This is so cool! Hopefully that's all he does.

]]>

item.title: Only 365 more days until next halloween
item.description:
That's a wrap for spooky season. It was unseasonably warm so it hasn't really felt like fall.

]]>
